gameworld

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameworld.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a room. The game consists of a series of connected rooms.
    Author:
    Latrell Whata 300417220

      • Room

        public Room(int row,
            int col,
            Tile[][] tiles,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String> doors)
        This constructor creates a room.
        Parameters:
        row - the row value of the room within the game board
        col - the column value of the room within the game board
        tiles - the tiles within the room
        doors - a list of doors that are within the room

        public AccessibleTile findNextTile(Tile currentTile,
                                   int dx,
                                   int dy)
        This method finds the resulting tile from translating by dx, dy from the current tile.
        Parameters:
        currentTile - the starting tile
        dx - the change in the row value
        dy - the change in the column value
        Returns:
        the next tile

        Returns:
        the row, col value for the tile

        the destination tile
